repairedDockerfile:
ARG from
FROM $from

RUN sbt assemblyAndCopy
RUN apt-get -y update && apt-get -y --no-install-recommends install python3-pip && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN apt-get clean && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir --upgrade pip
RUN pip3 install --no-cache-dir pyspark==2.4.0 numpy

ENV PYSPARK_PYTHON python3.6
ENV PYSPARK_DRIVER_PYTHON python3.6

WORKDIR python/
